      • addCountry

        public boolean addCountry​(java.lang.String countryName,
                          java.lang.String continentName,
                          int coordinateX,
                          int coordinateY)
        The function to add new Country in existing continent
        参数:
        countryName - The name of country want to add
        continentName - The name of existing continent country belong to
        coordinateX - The X coordinate of country
        coordinateY - The Y coordinate of country
        返回:
        boolean
